title: ThisOrThat
description: ThisOrThat is a game which you can choose between two options and see the result. Make sure to comment about your preferred option there.

title: ReviewTheExperience
description: A MERN stack application that allows users to review what they have experienced with car, house, place and more. Users can sign in or sign up to post their review, comment, like and much more.
tech: Mongodb, Expressjs, Reactjs, Nodejs, Redux toolkit, Tailwindcss

title: Libvery
description: An easy to use web application for those who wants to buy/sell books.
tech: Reactjs, Redux Toolkit, Firebase, Tailwindcss and Figma.

title: Weather App
description: A simple weather app built while learning reactjs.
tech: Reactjs, Talwindcss, API and Framer motion.
